Tom's watch bar Ms lingo welcome

manager of licenses and consumer

Avenue in Ward 3. the applicant is
requesting approval of a permanent
expansion of premises to add seating to
a Sidewalk Cafe which will be adjacent
to the existing outdoor area on the city
right-of-way their plan has been
approved by Public Works hours of
operation Monday through Thursday 4 pm
to 11 p.m Friday Saturday 11 A.M to 11
pm they are proposing to add 76 seats
along the Sixth Street side and the
Hennepin Avenue side of their business
on June 20th 2023 19 public hearing
notices were sent to Property Owners
within 450 feet of the premises notices
were also emailed to the downtown
Minneapolis neighborhood organization
Warehouse District Business Association
